name: Axe Park VR
description:
Summary:

Developed over a 12 week period, Axe Park is a Virtual Reality playground and a risk-free environment where you can smash objects and throw as many axes as you like!

Directions/Text Aids are at each station. Explore the environment at your will.

Controls:

Teleport: Touchpad (Hold and Release).

Interact with Buttons: Wack the button with your hand.

Grab Axes: Once you have spawned an axe by hitting the red button, reach out to the axe and hold the grip button on your controller.

Development:

This game was created by Jack Veselovski.

This is a small demo of Axe Park, as the game is currently still in development.

Developed with Windows Mixed Reality and HTC Vive Pro.

Jack Veselovski is going into his 3rd year of Game Design studies at the Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology.
